businesses.description: GoLynk lets 3PLs, regional carriers, courier companies, and mobility operators monetise spare capacity on existing routes. You keep control of your network and contracts; we add demand that fits your plans, so GoLynk becomes incremental revenue, not a replacement. You keep your clients, rates, and dispatch. GoLynk adds incremental demand that matches your constraints.
businesses.heading: For Fleets & Operators

options.courierServices: Courier Services (10–50 vehicles) – Your fleet already moves. Now it earns more without extra cost.
options.lastMile: Hyperlocal Last-Mile Providers – Your local footprint becomes a high-value microhub.
options.thirdPartyLogistics: 3PL / Logistics Operators – Turn distributed fleet capacity into a real-time revenue engine.
options.vanOperators: Van Operators / Small Fleets – Between-service gaps become revenue automatically.

You decide when to accept and what to carry, and you deliver for verified shippers with in-app support if anything goes wrong.
